text:
I've define two service, someone has one host definition.
In this host there's a JDBCRealm tag that it takes authentication
from a postgreql database.

When I authenticate in browser in the first host, al it's Ok, bu in the second 
host I don't have authentication.

First host (service) definition is relative this PC, second is a virtual host 
that it is point to this pc.
